body_html: Just to make sure we don't lose sight of this issue, there should be some discussion of what the best solution to this is. As I see it, the two easiest fixes is either to revert 7bcdcbb or simply bump the officially supported version of bazel to 0.3.1.
body_text: Just to make sure we don't lose sight of this issue, there should be some discussion of what the best solution to this is. As I see it, the two easiest fixes is either to revert 7bcdcbb or simply bump the officially supported version of bazel to 0.3.1.
body: Just to make sure we don't lose sight of this issue, there should be some discussion of what the best solution to this is. As I see it, the two easiest fixes is either to revert 7bcdcbbf or simply bump the officially supported version of bazel to 0.3.1.
